full_text: CHAMA Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 Cambridge Haman American Association me. 106 Windeor Street, Cambridge, Mass. 02139 Tel.(617)402-0622 A tax stamp No. 1701 E canceled tarif CERTIFICATE OF RELIGIOUS MARRIAGE Liberty Equality Fraternity Republic of Haiti Mcoflet In the year nineteen hundred seventy-three, Year 170 of Independance, and on Wednesday October tenth. We, Jacques M. Oriol, Civil Registrar of Port au Prince East sector, signature below. Having examined the documents transmitted to us by Father Lafontant, Pastor of the Sacred Heart Parish, in conformance with Article 6 of the Law of December 16 1929 as amended by that of January 26 1945. Do state, enregister, and certify that, the banns having been duly posted and no ob- jection having been indicated to the above-named minister of religion, Mister PIERRE GILBERT MAGNY, accountant, presenting his (#); twenty-nine years and seven months of age, born in Petionville, domiciled in Port au Prince; son of Breneville Magny, carpenter, domiciled in Port au Prince, and of Berenice Laurent, clerk, domi- ciled in Port au Prince; speaking for himself and on his own behalf on the one hand; and MARIE MONA PETIT, typist, duly presenting (#); twenty-seven years and seven months of age, born at Cap Haitian, domiciled in Port au Prince; daughter of Grandjean Petit, tailor, domiciled in Cap Haitian, and of Idora Pierre Paul, seamstress, domiciled in Cap haitian; speaking for herself and on her own behalf on the other hand; Presented themselves on August fourth nineteen hundred seventy-three at six-fifteen o'clock in the evening at the Church of the Sacred Heart in order to contract marriage. To the question if they consented to take each other for husband and wife, they re- plied each separately and in the affirmative in the presence of the above-named minis- ter a religion and of 1) Michel Gelin, professor, twenty-nine years of age, and of Mme Ghislaine Audouin, accountant, thirty-three years of age, both domiciled in Port au Prince. They have been thus joined in marriage. The certificate issued by the above minister of religion was signed by him: P. Lafontant. In witness whereof we have issued and signed this certificate, in conformance with the Law. (s) J. M. Oriol. two notes to the margin Signed: signature/stamp parish seal/ signature of priest: P. Lafontant. left margin: No. 191 (#) marriage licence issued for this year no. 17671 (initials) (#) marriage licence issued for this year no. 17672 (initials) I, the undersigned, do certify that I am competant in reading and understanding both the English and the French languages and that the foregoing is a true and accurate translation of the annexed document. an Them anguest Anthony Augustus, Translator Bonny J. Saintelot, Notary Public My commission expires May 28 1987
